article_title: Employers pinched as health-care costs soar
article_text:

article_metadata.description: Jennifer Williams can commiserate with central Ohio household budgeters bedeviled by the uncertainty of health-care costs. Williams and her husband, Scott Bowman, own Weiland’s Market in Indianola Plaza and are seeing their share of their employees’ health-care costs surge 34 percent this year, to more than $200,000 annually.
